Fencer ModuleÔÉÅ

fencer.py

This module contains the Fencer class. Every participant in a Tournament gets a Fencer object. This module also holds the different Stage enums of the Tournament.

class fencer.Fencer(name: str, club: Optional[str] = None, nationailty: Optional[str] = None, start_number: Optional[int] = None, num_prelim_rounds: int = 1)[source]ÔÉÅ
